content: helps me remember when my appointments are!! i’m never late because it tells me when my appointments are!!!

title: Healow
content: healow. just started using but it is not so easy pulling up your appointment every time you see it but it says no appointment schedule you can not open to find out for certain

title: Like it A lot
content: like it a lot. so far it great, i get my results on here before the dr. office even calls. plus all info is on here easy to find.

title: Already quit working
content: already quit working. i started using this about 8 hours ago, got one message through my doctor and since then i get as far as log in and that's it. every feature says it can't be accessed all of a sudden. so it's now basically useless.

title: Unhealthy App
content: unhealthy app. i wish my doc used a different portal. there are so many ones with better user experience. this one is clunky. much of the time the subcategories won’t open. hard to use overall. hard to find what you’re looking for.

title: App updated and still don’t open for me.
content: app updated and still don’t open for me. app used to work great! now it won’t even open. i have to use the portal on the web. please fix soon. still waiting for a fix on app not opening. i use portal on web page. funny i don’t have this issue with medchart.

title: Useless app
content: useless app. it doesn’t provide a functional way to view or even reset one’s user name. my doctor’s office mistakenly entered my first and middle names, joined to my last name and birth year as my user name. no adaptation of that was functional … and your website showed no way to address this mess.

title: App is now useless.
content: app is now useless. since new update user on ipad must now use  apple device passcode or fingerprint to proceed . i refuse to change my security settings on my ipad just to use this app. why have a app login 4 digit pin if security is the problem. fix this and eliminate that device passcode requirement or goodbye healow.

title: Fix password reset
content: fix password reset. trying to reset my password. my first attempt met all criteria, had 24 characters. the app said it was too weak. i tried a longer password using all stated criteria and 56 characters; clicked the reset password button and it did not respond at all.

title: Terrible
content: terrible. impossible to set up new account. it assigned some weird email address as log in id. would not accept any password i set up following the guidelines. went through “easy” access multiple times. this app needs some serious maintenance.

title: Stuck in PIN/Face ID loop
content: stuck in pin/face id loop. i’ve been able to access my medical portal once. since then, every time i log in, the app keeps asking me to enter my pin (or use face id when i have that enabled). it’s a constant loop and i’m unable to actually do anything! fix your login process and let me save my credentials, please.

title: Doesn’t work for mobile
content: doesn’t work for mobile. this app seems to work pretty well on my laptop but it doesn’t work at all on my iphone. i can login but it doesn’t show anything from my doctor’s office even though it’s linked. very frustrating to use.

title: IOS incompatible
content: ios incompatible. has activity tracking link with everything but ios, why say you ios compatible when you don’t even have an option to manually sink with ios - i’ve had fitbit’s of almost every level they’re overpriced  junk imo regardless there should be a way to get there.

title: Need support for iPhone X
content: need support for iphone x. pretty good app! i've been using it for a while and i haven't come across any issues. it's a little buggy but nothing i can't handle.

title: Very uncomfortable
content: very uncomfortable. i get an email that i have something new. when i login there is nothing new. this has happened at least 5 times. are you putting my records in someone else's account? i was uncomfortable with this app from the beginning.

title: Rating
content: rating. this is very helpful but i would also like to see results or messages on my x-rays and ultra sounds.

title: I like all the choices to make appointment
content: i like all the choices to make appointment. registering was troublesome though and the color not so great, wish all these health portal apps dropped the color stuff and become all white , makes it easier to read menus!!

title: Not good
content: not good. i really don’t like this app, so much so that i’m thinking about switching doctors. i’ve used other apps for other medical providers and this app is the worst one i’ve ever used. my doctor’s name doesn’t show up when i try to pick her out of a list to send a message.

title: Program needs a lot of work!
content: program needs a lot of work! use of this app is not worth the time.  the interface is awkward … not user friendly. it requires access to your device’s camera and microphone even if you are not making a video call.

title: Needs update NOW!
content: needs update now! is very sluggish when doing anything. probably because it isn’t optimized for ios 13, so it needs an update immediately if it wants to work at all.

title: Doesn’t work!
content: doesn’t work! when the app was working it was very useful but now it is dead. on startup i get an error message telling me to reset my passcode on my device. i cannot get beyond this dead end. i’m frustrated because help from the developers is also non existent.

title: The App is very buggy
content: the app is very buggy. the app is very buggy and has created so many issues during login.   when you create a medical app, the developers should be extra careful. this should not be another useless commercial app.   i am not impressed at all. it’s waste of time.

title: Not at all good
content: not at all good. i called numerous times to set up account and never worked.  i finally had to beg the doctors to give me a hard copy of the test results as this system does not work.  very frustrating especially when it is dealing with your health.

title: Poor app
content: poor app. have been trying for at least 30 minutes to log on. have been asked multiple times to reset, which i did. still getting the same response. worthless if i can’t log in.

title: Waste of Time. Don’t Even Bother
content: waste of time. don’t even bother. i’ve seen better interfaces on a tic-tax-toe app! i tried unsuccessfully several times to get into the app and the web site. could not reset password. no messages to say what went wrong. felt like i was using photo buttons instead of a menu.

title: Buggy and hard to get accounts linked
content: buggy and hard to get accounts linked. this app is super buggy for me. it doesn’t let me push certain buttons when trying to find a provider and linking two accounts at the same time causes it to crash and fail to load screens.

title: So many things
content: so many things. i can’t change my personal contact information. i can’t change the medications i am taking. even short term medications can’t be deleted! so much more, but i’m too frustrated to name them all. definitely not worth the aggravation.

title: So so
content: so so. want notifiers so i know if and when sent messages have been read! not having this information makes communicating difficult. without such information i find that i wonder if this app is even working/functional.

title: Adding another person
content: adding another person. i love the app, i have my husband on it ,on my ipad but how do i go about adding myself to it also ? can you have 2 users on 1 app. .?

title: App works great!
content: app works great! haven’t had any problems with the app. and i love having access to my health and appointment info.

title: Horrible app
content: horrible app. this app doesn't work! i've tried everything i know to get logged on and it will not let me. when i click on search for health care provider it just sits there after entering the info. if it would just allow the actual login page that might work.

title: So frustrating
content: so frustrating. i can log in but any email i get sent that tells me to go to the portal to look at a message or a bill is pointless. the message never loads, there’s no place to view the billing statements and it’s just disappointing as a whole

title: Worst app ever
content: worst app ever. i have been trying for an hour to make some sense of this thing. at this point the easiest solutions seem to be changing doctors, changing medical groups or giving up on health care altogether. i’m completely frustrated. would not recommend to my worst enemy

title: Compared to My Chart, this app stinks!
content: compared to my chart, this app stinks! i wish this doc would switch to my chart instead if this garbage. constant log in difficulty, mobile app appearance comes up in tiny format, hard to navigate and generally not user friendly. not worth the app space frankly.

title: Search function doesn’t work
content: search function doesn’t work. i think the first thing in development for an app like this would be ease of use. the practice i utilize isn’t properly listed, the search function doesn’t work correctly and i’m not recognized as patient.

title: Complete Junk
content: complete junk. if you have more than one doctor using this app save yourself some heartache and just call them. this app is a nightmare to setup more than one doctor. their website is terrible on a mobile device. the app is terribly slow.

title: Kinda bogus
content: kinda bogus. i got testers recently and had to call planned parenthood for my results because no results were being show for april when i went in. i want them on my phone so i can communicate this to my partner but they aren’t even in my portal as if my account isn’t linked properly or something.

title: Healow App 6.0.0 doesn’t work on cellular
content: healow app 6.0.0 doesn’t work on cellular. my experience with the app is it works fine when my iphone xr is on wifi. when i try to use it on cellular only it connects when i sign in with pin but only gives me access to my medications. all other functions such as records and messages is unavailable.

title: Doesn’t connect to Apple Health
content: doesn’t connect to apple health. this is close to useless without it connecting to apple health, which houses my workouts, weight and bmi from my scale, etc. that info would be extremely help to be linked with my doctor’s records. can’t believe that’s not available in 2019

title: Password reset is very difficult
content: password reset is very difficult. password resets are very difficult both on app and website! real pain

title: I just want to see past records
content: i just want to see past records. why can’t i see past vitals to track my weight, and why will it not allow me to see past appointments? it only displays the most recent for both. seriously the only thing i want

title: Unreliable and error prone
content: unreliable and error prone. started out fine but as more practices are loaded, appointment functions are becoming more buggy. appointment reminders are for doctors i never heard of, appointments disappear the day before the appointment, and on-line appointment maker does not allow cancellations. totally useless for day to day appointment manager. frustrating!

title: Healow
content: healow. in attempting to leave a message for my provider, i found it impossible as no providers come up w search. states “no providers”.  so how do you make this work? also cannot get it to open w it’s own icon. have to keep returning to app store. very frustrating.

title: Portal
content: portal. i like being able to check health up dates

title: Very content😉
content: very content😉. thank you for the great effort the whole staff does to treat the patients, i am truly please and content with how easy is to know what is going on with my self health wise.

title: Worst Patient Portal Ever
content: worst patient portal ever. the healow system is a complete failure.  with regard to providing patients with access to any relevant medical data, healow does not measure up to the competition.  total waste of time!  will definitely be reporting healow’s patient portal access fails to my physician when i see him next week.

title: Garbage
content: garbage. this app is garbage and does not work. it is completely flawed . not user friendly poor interface. can’t link my accounts.. poor design . a lot of bugs and customer service does not call you back

title: Junk
content: junk. i don’t get a confirmation that a message was received or a prescription request received. my upcoming appointments don’t show up. i can’t edit my medications. i get better response from restaurant apps.

title: Of very little use
content: of very little use. not a lot of use for this app other than seeing lab results when the doctor gets around to approving them. maybe it works for other but i’m unable to make appointments or communicate with the office.

title: Does not work
content: does not work. i have not been able to creat an account will not let me move past the content screen, because nothing even comes up or displays in the field of what i’m consenting to. it is very frustrating.

title: No longer can access my info
content: no longer can access my info. even though i have a passcode on the app, it is requiring me to have a passcode for my phone, which i do not want. so i no longer have access to my info or my doctors.  they’re protecting my information all right.

title: Wow totally horrible as of today
content: wow totally horrible as of today. have been using previous versions for years. bug fixes added new problems. i refuse to use apple’s passcode or face recognition, unfortunately healow will not allow you to get to their login screen without adding a passcode. so, bye bye app.

title: Ok but needs an update
content: ok but needs an update. the app doesn’t provide a pdf version of the reports and doesn’t connect with apple products/apps?? needs some serious updates in order to be a better app.

title: Crappy
content: crappy. not easy to navigate, merges doctors if you have more than one. i prefer to log in on line where i can use my keyboard on my ipad. the app doesn’t rotate to fit the screen. don’t like it at all

title: Useless
content: useless. it doesn’t list all my appointments, only about half of my results show up, and it gets locked in a loop. what is it’s purpose if you can’t use it? dump this system and find one that works!
🙂❤️🙂❤️🙂. i like this app.  it is pretty convenient and has all your information at hand.

title: New update
content: new update. since the new update the app will continue to crash or say it will only work on an  un-modified version of ios. there are no modifications to my ios and i just finished doing the most recent update with apple its frustrating as i use the app consistently for my sons pediatrician appointments and medical records. please fix this asap.

title: App once worked, no more
content: app once worked, no more. been on before. now doesn’t work. tried to send them an email but when you put in your address can’t change the state you live in, the address page is stuck in alabama. that’s fine if you live in alabama. fix the app for crying out loud.

title: App is great
content: app is great. so far it is very intuitive and it does what it should. can see labs and write messages.

title: Good app for just information
content: good app for just information. good app if you’re just looking for information. wish you could schedule appointments with your actual doctor through this app

title: Doesn’t Support Apple Watch and HealthKit
content: doesn’t support apple watch and healthkit. the medical info works for the most part, but not having apple watch and healthkit support to link my data automatically is a huge letdown.   as of right now, the data syncing is completely useless on apple devices.

title: Ok but lacks some features
content: ok but lacks some features. should be able to read our own past sent messages...like the providers website portal does.

title: Disappointing After Years
content: disappointing after years. interface requires too many steps to do essential things like find provider. can't sync with ios health app, omron devices. information is inaccessible or lost.

title: Please Change the Color
content: please change the color. not visually friendly  baby blue is too light a color for me to see. i can’t read it. navy blue is a better choice for my eyes. not visibility friendly.

title: Health?
content: health? nice to see my health info via an app but would appreciate if it worked with apple health so i could have everything in one place. especially labs and vitals.

title: Easy and fast.
content: easy and fast. excellent app. very easy to navigate thru. and very functional.

title: Unable to reply to messages
content: unable to reply to messages. update needed so we can respond/reply to the physician instead of starting a new message

title: Forces phone pin
content: forces phone pin. this was app was a great tool but with a recent update it now forces you to set up a pin for your phone. you already have a pin for the app but it wants you to have a pin on your phone. frankly it’s no one’s business if i have a pin on my phone or not.

title: Incomplete
content: incomplete. the app lacks the ability to connect to my apple watch and track my steps or other vitals, or allow apple’s health app collect medication or lab results.

title: Text unreadable!
content: text unreadable! easy to use except the text is rendered in not black but a light grey!  not able to read on an iphone….attempts to report this issue leads to an inoperative web page …truly frustrating! 2nd issue is that lab reports flow in as a continuous line of text….

title: No Apple Watch support
content: no apple watch support. extremely annoyed that you’re unable to add apple watch under trackers. fitbit, google fit, even nokia, but not apple watch/health. yes, you can manually add your steps/distance, but honestly, it’s not worth the hassle.

title: Horrible app! Can never see my appointments
content: horrible app! can never see my appointments. every time i have an appointment it is listed in the app, but i can never see it the day of the appointment. here we are for the second time ive missed an appointment because i have no clue where or which doctor its with!  really lame app. developers, get it right already!

title: WORST LOGIN EXPERIENCE EVER
content: worst login experience ever. i have been trying to login for half an hour now. reset my password i don’t know how many times. and still can’t get in. kept saying invalid login credentials. never seen any app like this before. horrible!!! if you don’t know how to build an app, you can contact me directly!

title: Need to add Apple Watch tracking
content: need to add apple watch tracking. good app but not nearly as useful as it could be without the ability to sync with my apple watch. apparently it syncs with other trackers like fitbit and google fit but not the equally popular apple watch and apple health.

title: They sell your contact info
content: they sell your contact info. this is the only app/service/company that has ever had my name spelled a certain way. after using this i’ve been getting spam texts that have my name spelled that way in them. avoid using this

title: app crashed
content: app crashed. even tho’ i was able to log into app while trying to look at my records it’s suddenly said i did it gave access and all of my messages disappeared. i don’t know how to gain access to the data in my file any long.

title: Doesn’t work
content: doesn’t work. looks like this company must have gotten federal funding and has not fixed the app since then. neither my physician or i have been able to set my portal up after repeated tries. junk. my physician and i have used email for the past three years and will continuing doing so. imho, this is a scam.

title: Text size
content: text size. a basic function of an app setting should be to be able to adjust text size, especially for a medical app. this app has “wonderful” complexities which would be “wonderful” to explore except, i strain to read it so... its garbage.

title: Data disappeared
content: data disappeared. i loved healow when it worked - would have given 5 stars.  somehow all the data got wiped out and my doctors office technical department was unable to get it back into the app - even though i can get it on their online portal.

title: Fine, but needs to add Face ID support
content: fine, but needs to add face id support. haven’t used the app for much but it really frustrates me that they only ask to enable touch id when i only have face id on my phone(11 pro).

title: JUNK!
content: junk! giving a rating of *stars just because you love your doctor and or staff is stupid! he and is has staff have nothing to do with this app! wasn't the intent of this app to streamline your connections to your dr's office? it's useless.  it works perfectly on my laptop, the app for ios 11 won't even allow me to log in.

title: Dr. Wendy Quirino and staff
content: dr. wendy quirino and staff. i’m very thankful and happy to dr. quirino an her staff. they were gentil, kind, answered all my questions, and always prompt to make sure everything was okay.

title: Less functionality in new release
content: less functionality in new release. i cannot open messages at all. i used to be able to do refills but that is no longer showing as message or in medications   please return functionality

title: Review
content: review. this is handy when i'm not at home and need access to what meds i'm taking. just remember, it all depends on your physician as to how good this app can really be.

title: Paperless
content: paperless. i love this app it keeps me informed of my doctor appointments, as well as my lab results, and medical records. all in one easy location.

title: No problems so far
content: no problems so far. i've had a few months.... it's ok. i like keeping up with my appts and meds. so far my dr's outside keeps things up to date..

title: Love how easy it is to use
content: love how easy it is to use. i love how easy it is to use. it has everything i need right at my finger tips!

title: Reviews were right
content: reviews were right. at first the app was amazing! it let me see my chart days before my provider would even call me, now i can’t even log in. i tried signing out and uninstalling the app and still nothing. very disappointing.

title: It’s not easy
content: it’s not easy. the old system all the buttons worked i had no problems communicating. with the new set up i’m having a difficulty communicating with my doctor or his assistance i have a problem trying to request refills.

title: Doesn’t even open
content: doesn’t even open. upon opening the app, it shows the splash screen for a split second then crashes. tried everything i can to fix but it doesn’t seem to be an issue on my end.

title: Healow app
content: healow app. this is great for deaf people need communication talk with doctors important stay information everything health 👍🏻👌🏻🙂

title: Need passcode on phone
content: need passcode on phone. dumb you have to put a passcode on your phone in order to get started with the app. i see the security issue but i don’t like the passcodes or face id on my phone it’s annoying an inconvenient.

title: Worthless App
content: worthless app. the app cannot find a large corporate medical group, a large hospital or my doctor who has been in practice for 26 years. it doesn’t work no matter what detailed information you provide or how you enter it. it is worthless and laughable.

title: Font Size and Contrast a ((BIG)) challenge1
content: font size and contrast a ((big)) challenge1. in spite of having good info, the font size is small, doesn’t expand with a finger spread and has terrible contrast.  i have to run for my magnifying glass to use it, so convenience is terrible with any vision challenges.

title: Tha absolute WORST
content: tha absolute worst. this is the most useless horrible app i have ever used. i t doesn’t allow me to add all of my surgeries or my primary doctor. it won’t let me sign in much of the time and doesn’t specify if my doctor visit is in person or virtual. i absolutely hate this joke of an app!

title: Just so hard to read!
content: just so hard to read! if you changes the white lettering against the light blue background, i’d give it 5 stars. but i dread opening it bc i can’t see to navigate through it and i have decent vision! the colors are pretty bit really hard to see the letters!

title: Can’t figure out how to view statement
content: can’t figure out how to view statement. i am logged into the app trying to find my statement and how to find out where in the app i can make a payment but can’t for the life of me find anything statement related or a button that says make payment

title: Terrible application
content: terrible application. difficult and frustrating to use unless you remember you credentials flawlessly. it send you an email and does not recognize you fill the information consistently with the email.

title: Fail
content: fail. new update from 2 days ago failed-it will not download for iphone. i have plenty of memory, no payment issues, no connectivity issues that i know of. this is our primary means of communication with my father’s doctor and he is gravely ill.

title: Needs health kit support
content: needs health kit support. my biggest concern is the support of health kit. other than that it’s fine. glad i can see my appointments. messaging interface is clunky, but it does work at least.

title: Works great if you don't have iPhone XS Max
content: works great if you don't have iphone xs max. this worked great for me when i had the iphone 6s plus. since i upgraded to the xs max, i cannot send messages because it will not populate the provider or location

title: Worthless App
content: worthless app. i’ve been trying to use this app off and on for the past 4 years.  i keep deleting it and adding it back hoping it will be better but no improvement.  it’s frustrating when i want to see my information or results.

title: Can’t ever login
content: can’t ever login. haven’t been able to login since i’ve gotten a new phone. i’ve tried changing my password and such, works on the old phone, won’t work on the new phone. kind of pointless if i can’t login to use it.

title: Helpful app
content: helpful app. works well for me and gives easy access to what i need.

title: Can’t get most info to show up!
content: can’t get most info to show up! none of my information shows up on their app or site it just says no information. the only things that show up are labs and med list.   i can’t get my vitals or med problems to show to show! i also can’t get appointments to show either. useless

title: Terrible app
content: terrible app. due to the many issues (frequently shutting off, can’t read or send messages, etc.) with this app, i only use it occasionally to see if they fixed the issues. they haven’t. so i have to go online to read and send messages to my doctor.

title: Tedious
content: tedious. i found it tedious. seems like i have an app for every dr & every thing else in my life. i just glaze over when i start having trouble with it.

title: Great app, accurate and user friendly
content: great app, accurate and user friendly. i don’t anything negative to say about this app.

title: Easy to use!
content: easy to use! this app is very easy to use and i love having my records and appointments at my fingertips.

title: Could this be any worse
content: could this be any worse. one of the most user unfriendly apps i've ever used. my primary care physician isn't even listed, and while i lived in georgia my account is linked to a practice in tennessee. typically login takes multiple attempts before success. if i could give it zero stars, i would it is truly a 💩.

title: Poor, limited
content: poor, limited. this is a poor and limited way to interface with your physician. this must be a free app for the doctor as it has no function. you cannot communicate with anyone. you cannot pay your bill. you cannot request script refills. you cannot obtain any information.

title: Logging in
content: logging in. i’ve tried for two days to log in and it still won’t let me in. tried everything, tried the app and just as bad. now i don’t know how to log in and pay my bill. hate this whole system

title: Ellen
content: ellen. i’m a senior and it has a been really easy so far to navigate. but i haven’t had to use it much.

title: Trash
content: trash. doesn’t work. plain and simple.  trash.  don’t waste your time. and even more so, i would question any doctor’s judgement who uses this app.   if this is how they make technical decisions, i can only imagine how bad their judgment is with medical decisions.  find a doc and a new app!

title: Sends constant notifications
content: sends constant notifications. there is a bug in this app. i keep getting notifications for hundreds of new messages and there is nothing there

title: Zero Stars
content: zero stars. my privacy is important. this developer collects both personal and sensitive information including government id. this developer also shares this information.... no thanks. i will not be downloading this app. call your dr and request records, it’s not that hard people. protect yourselves!

title: Almost, but not quite right
content: almost, but not quite right. i shouldn’t have to change my correct grammar and punctuation to incorrect grammar and punctuation just to get a message to get to my dr’s office!  other than that, i would give it 5 stars.

title: Doesn’t work
content: doesn’t work. i finally had this set up and working on my iphone by facial recognition. it was a relief to have the facial recognition log in set up because it never works. a few days later i try to log in and it tells my credentials are wrong. my account is always being locked. complete waste of my time.

title: Slow to connect
content: slow to connect. this app has potential...but most of it seems useless.  it’s cumbersome to use.  it’s slow to connect.  it lacks apple health integration.  it has no notifications (or if it does, they don’t work).  it’s not tied into epic.  it feels like the app is 10 years behind any other health app out there.

title: Updated version needs work
content: updated version needs work. this app was great to organize my appointments, medicines, and lab work but after the recent update i can't access my information.

title: It helps
content: it helps. this app helps me find lab results (and not misplace them).  i can see the doctors notes about my visits. i'm very pleased.

title: Why can’t you import into Health?
content: why can’t you import into health? have been using this app with no problems but don’t understand why the app is not available to import data and my records into the apple health app.

title: Doctor not using
content: doctor not using. appears to be a good application if doctors use it. no visit summary information, no test results, no information except your appointment information. too bad doctors don’t use it.

title: Awesome
content: awesome. being able to communicate with my doctor is awesome!!!

title: Love y
content: love y. having the ability to communicate with my doctor and see my records is great!!

title: Trouble with app
content: trouble with app. the app does not show appointments, the medication section does not show all medicines, it freezes constantly. it does not have up to date medical records and this is really challenging when needing the information for specialists.

title: Always a problem
content: always a problem. i appreciate the convenience of the app but it is constantly buffering or not recognizing my credentials or timing out just a complete pain when my caregiver uses this to communicate due to covid

title: Terrible
content: terrible. if you’re going to have a mobile app for use, make sure it works and supplies all information available from the doctor. only item this app shows is that i made an account. horrible app!

title: Doesn’t work deleted.
content: doesn’t work deleted. just dld and deleted. no matter what password i put in it says to weak n will not let me confirm. i tried multiple xs with increasing long passwords. using numbers symbols n letters. same response! 🤬dislike time wasters. deleted as it appears to be useless.

title: Messaging Feature Needs Work!
content: messaging feature needs work! overall, the app is helpful but the ui/ux needs serious work. also, please make it to where we can respond to messages instead of creating a new one for the same instance.

title: Mark
content: mark. this is the worst portal for being user friendly!  it is like going through a maze to get logged on and or finding on the internet apps.  chinese must be in on it!  who knows who is actually getting the info!  just my opinion.

title: Love this app, just one request for future update
content: love this app, just one request for future update. can you please add a function that connects the health app and apple watch tracker?

title: Log In is infurating
content: log in is infurating. i know they are stuck with hippa but logging in to view one’s children’s data is very confusing and frustrating and so far impossible. also, it does not seem set up well for co parents and other non traditional families

title: Poor visibility
content: poor visibility. for those of us who have vision limitations, this app is barely usable.  the text size is too small and cannot be increased (or i can’t see how to do it) and the low contrast between the white background and the aqua colored text makes the visibility even worse. please make this app 508 and wcag compliant.

title: Very buggy
content: very buggy. this app has a lot of potential but it needs to work out some bugs that cause lab results not to render, for example. i got an error message even when i tried to report the error.

title: So Much Potential Wasted
content: so much potential wasted. a very clean app that is easy to navigate and runs very smoothly. until you actually need any information about your records or messages.    messages are not formatted to the app correctly, making them irritating the view and navigate.   medical results do not always appear in results tab, making you struggle through the incorrectly formatted messages.   all the building blocks are in place for this app, all that is left is delivering the information to the user.

title: Nonexistent support
content: nonexistent support. app is slow and clunky, support is not responsive, and overall right now it’s a waste of space. i will give it another chance since it may be the link to the dr’s office but i expect an app like this to be able to talk to the ehr at the dr’s.

title: Useless
content: useless. if i needed my blood pressure raised to threatening levels, i would try to use this app! the fools who have 3 different apps for one patient should be fired! really…,dosher patient portal, healow and my care corner!! why?  if your medical care is as bad as your it, you need a mortuary . the dead don’t need a patient portal!!

title: App really stinks
content: app really stinks. the online version is great, but the app does not mirror it. the app has potential and i love easier access through my phone but adding your physicians is entirely too cumbersome to be worthwhile. i’ll access it through safari.

title: No Apple HealthKit support
content: no apple healthkit support. this app can work with random third-party trackers, but not the built-in health kit and apple watch. it would be able to provide so much more useful information if it supported those.

title: Rate of app
content: rate of app. i like the app except i cannot figure out how to send a message to my doctor.

title: Remove the iPhone facelock
content: remove the iphone facelock. due to medical reasons my kids need to have access to my phone so i can not put a lock on it. i can’t use this app because it’s requiring not only a lock for the app but one for the phone itself!

title: Extremely poorly designed and coded app
content: extremely poorly designed and coded app. this app is a disaster at nearly every level. if your doctor uses this let her know that the app reflects very poorly on her business.   overall an extremely frustrating and inoperative app

title: Cannot do what I need to do
content: cannot do what i need to do. i logged on here to cancel appointments but apparently that is not a feature.  also wanted to leave messages another failure. i also had a very had time getting on to this app.  for me it is a complete bust.

title: If I could give zero stars I would
content: if i could give zero stars i would. unfortunately i have several doctors using this for their portal, but no way for the app to integrate them at all. it only sees one and that practice no longer uses this application. it’s completely useless to me.

title: Needs work
content: needs work. of the 100+ logins i use, this is one may be the most dysfunctional and arcane. at this point in time “why?” seems like a reasonable question.  ”security” as an excuse/reason has long been unacceptably thin. other apps get it right, please do the same.

title: Reset my account and no email yet
content: reset my account and no email yet. i’m not sure what’s going on with their system but i have yet to receive my password reset email. checked my spam folder.

title: It’s making it very difficult to do something that should be easy
content: it’s making it very difficult to do something that should be easy. took forever to figure out how i could get in. when i did, it didn’t sync with records from another physician. i’m on ipad pro i feel like i’m running with one leg nailed to the floor.

title: THIS APP IS SO FAR BEHIND IT’S PRE 1985
content: this app is so far behind it’s pre 1985. this app is mickeymouse. it doesn’t synchronize my ipad or any of my other idevices. healow app is way behind; it’ dark ages and have relatively few functions. there’s no scheduling, no health summaries. basically, it’s a portal for: emails and appointments. the provider don’t update ‘my records” or ‘medications”.  the link devices function is an insulting not funny joke.

title: Wondering the Age
content: wondering the age. i am considering the app.  just from reading these few reviews i am wondering the ages of those reviews i read. thus, i am coming to the conclusion that both parties must be active in this app.......if not.....this angst.

title: Please add functionality
content: please add functionality. i would love to use this app to track physical activity and or diet, much like my app from livestrong. that may not be your primary focus but it would make it more useful

title: This has potential.
content: this has potential. this portal has potential to be very good but it’s of no use if my doctors office doesn’t put anything in it.

title: One way communication only
content: one way communication only. this app wants to be efficient, but i could not use it to communicate with my mds office. i think it should facilitate 2-way communication, not just doctor to patient, but patient to doctor. i spent a lot of time trying to figure out communication...couldn’t do it. therefore a waste of my time.

title: Right idea, Poor implementation
content: right idea, poor implementation. color scheme difficult to see tiny fonts. no granular controls to adjust app. is not intelligent - requires city and state to both be entered for city. should use lookup database. poorly designed and implemented. and error msg for having an apostrophe. are you kidding me?

title: Unable to use the app, even after repeated tries
content: unable to use the app, even after repeated tries. did not work for me.  other medical practices use other apps that are more user friendly and efficient

title: No way to refill prescription
content: no way to refill prescription. fairly useless in my opinion. why isn’t there a way to do something as basic as renew a prescription?  or if that gesture does exist, where is it hidden???

title: It Used To Work Well
content: it used to work well. the app no longer works and now accessed my mic and camera all the time.  even when it says it’s off, i get a message telling me what’s off and on.  i just need to track appointments. i don’t need it on for telehealth so it seems sketchy.

title: Causes high blood pressure
content: causes high blood pressure. the worst app ever developed - unless it was designed to sell blood pressure medication.  it loses passwords, changes user id  to email address - which it then says doesn’t exist - and invents it’s own security question.  sends irrelevant notifications. no time to list more.

title: Awful app
content: awful app. no accessibility features. font is small, pale and illegible.:completely inappropriate for older users and anyone without perfect vision. throughout the current health crisis i have received multiple, long messages from my provider none of which i can read.

title: Please make this app work with Apple Watch
content: please make this app work with apple watch. app is ok, can’t seem to easily request prescription renewal without sending full email. wish this worked with apple watch.

title: Expand
content: expand. app works perfectly and would recommend you expand this app to the ipad. would give it a higher rating with the expansion.

title: Frustrating!!!
content: frustrating!!! downloaded this app to access my husband’s lab report & cannot find any way to add his name!  we will vent our frustrations to our doctor asap!  the previous website used by our doctor had both of our records accessible easily and without an app!

title: Where’s the users manual.
content: where’s the users manual. this app is extremely difficult to use. i have doctors showing in my list that i do not or have ever used and no instructions how to delete them. when i enter my doctor he’s not there. please make this easier to use or provide a help icon.

title: Updates for iOS 11?
content: updates for ios 11? it worked well until recently. i cannot pull up info majority of the time now. it’s constantly “loading”.

title: Can’t use an apostrophe?!
content: can’t use an apostrophe?! there seem to be some cool features available but my doctor doesn’t use them.   what really bugs me is that the app won’t let you use a “special character” and that includes an apostrophe!  huh?!

title: Love love love
content: love love love. i love this app. i can always see when my appointment is and what medications they have on record.

title: Is this some sort of joke?
content: is this some sort of joke? just downloaded this so i could send my dr a message. it allows you to scroll down affiliated practices but only to the letter o (my office begins with p), or scroll down the drs names but only to the letter c (i need s)!  so i can’t actually send my doctor a message through it like any other patient portal. absurd!

title: Very helpful app!!
content: very helpful app!! i like that it keeps track of my appointments and health information!!!

title: Difficult
content: difficult. it’s difficult to maneuver through and my information has been sent but can’t find it.

title: Works very well!
content: works very well! app works very well with no glitches to date.

title: Messaging needs to improve
content: messaging needs to improve. please make messaging function like a normal email application.  email and messaging is nothing new.   this app makes it too hard.

title: Passcode issue
content: passcode issue. it is ridiculous that i am forced to have a passcode to get into my iphone, just to be able to use the app. which requires a second passcode to get into anyway. this “feature” is a little overbearing.

title: Can’t use it!
content: can’t use it! i can’t use it! it won’t work unless i set my device to open with a passcode. i don’t want to secure the ipad that never leaves my house with a lock, either fingerprint or passcode. it’s a royal nuisance to unlock it every time i pick it up.

title: App does not work
content: app does not work. this app is not opening once download, it crashes and just closes. i have uninstalled it and reinstalled it still not working. iam using an iphone 12 pro max running ios 15.3 this needs to be fixed

title: Messages fonts are too tiny to read. Why is this?
content: messages fonts are too tiny to read. why is this? messaging fonts are too small to read and cant open it to view it. there no rely feature. why is this

title: Cannot connect to server
content: cannot connect to server. app is unusable. constantly get error message that it can’t connect to the server as i’m trying to do the initial setup.   very frustrating given the fact that it’s holding access to needed medical info!!!

title: Terrible
content: terrible. not user friendly with more than one practisioner, does not use same password and would not recognize new password no matter how carefully i put it in or confirmed.  finally gave up, frustrated, and deleted app.!!!

title: Bad update
content: bad update. after installing the update, this app wiped everything clean.  we can still get in on the computer patient portal, but this has been made useless on the app.  even trying to delete and reinstalling is useless.

title: Disaster
content: disaster. this app is way too hard to use.  it doesn’t allow for much “special characters” like an apostrophe!  what language does the developers speak that has no ‘ ?  it seems i have to try 4-5 times before my message finally gets to my medical provider.

title: It's hard to use
content: it's hard to use. it took a long time to set up with multiple conversations with doctor's office (who were very nice and helpful.) it is awkward to use for emails.

title: WTH
content: wth. i wanted this portal so i could contact my doctor. but it requires you to pick a facility. but gives you no options to choose from. so i can’t contact my doctor. and i did try to write an email and you can’t use punctuation at all. nothing. ok so make me look totally stupid, thanks. worthless app. to me.

title: My two cents!
content: my two cents! i wish there was a compose email feature to send emails to my doctor. leaving a voice mail and waiting for a return phone call for many days seems archaic.  also i wish there was a feature to view  radiology reports. it stinks that i had to send an official written request and wait 5-7 days for the report.  can’t correct typos entered by receptionist.  there are many other patient portals that have these capabilities.

title: Upset
content: upset. have had this app for months, but now it wants all my dr. info. cannot get the scale, which is why i bought it. i have no wish to enter this information in this app. i have contacts in other places. if this isn’t fixed soon will delete app. useless to me.

title: Not great
content: not great. maybe my problem is with the office staff. i do get appointment reminders by email along with information on downloading the app and registering. beyond that, the results are the first done after installing. i have other apps with various doctors that are always up to date.

title: Sm app
content: sm app. very hard to use on an iphone.  why isn’t this available on ipad? as a sr citizen it is very hard to use. the print is extremely small.

title: Easy to use
content: easy to use. your own medical info at the tips of your fingers!  explore and learn to use app and it's awesome.

title: Not helpful
content: not helpful. there’s generally no useful info on this app. no one at jcmg seems interested enough to press upload on patient info to make it work. if i need a report or result, i go to the records department and get a hardcopy. (it’s not like the nurse line is really going to call w/ that info.)

title: App is poor.
content: app is poor. very few services. what is there often doesn’t work. it seems only to be for keeping track of appointments.

title: Sending messages
content: sending messages. the app is ok buuuut... sending a message to a doctor is a nightmare! the app doesn’t allow apostrophes or certain symbols. autocorrect puts these automatically e.g. don’t or isn’t  the app won’t let you submit the message unless you remove the symbols. aka takes forever also, you can’t reply to a message, you have to start a new one. come on guys! this is basic, you can do better...

title: Repeatedly crashing
content: repeatedly crashing. can’t even open the app after the latest update, it immediately crashes. uninstalled and reinstalled and it still doesn’t work. iphone 13 pro max

title: Horrible app sonfar
content: horrible app sonfar. not able to book appointments. not able to communicate with my provider. he doesn’t even show up as the practice provider. not able to see results. in al. just works for my following appointment. and i jave the calendar app for that.  overall. usless app for me.

title: Very Disappointed
content: very disappointed. i call my provider at least 4 times and never got anything resolved. one time their it was to call me back, never receive the callback. if the information was enter this apps would super but it don’t and there no support with my provider sentenel partners of camden sc too

title: Limited usefulness
content: limited usefulness. i can see my upcoming appointments but not my past. test results are in one continuous run-on paragraph that is difficult to decipher

title: Minimally Adequate
content: minimally adequate. communicates information. but clumsy. for example, i cannot copy a message from my doctor to my calendar. so if she sends me the name and practice of doctors for a consultation, i have to literally memorize it and rewrite it in my calendar program. that just makes no sense.

title: No provision for “replying “
content: no provision for “replying “. you cannot reply to a message. you are literally forced to create a new message for every response, that’s an horrific flaw.

title: Useless
content: useless. this is the most useless app i’ve ever had to use in my life. won’t let me login even tho i’ve reset my password then when i tried to reset my password again the email won’t come through for me to do so.

title: Worst App Ever
content: worst app ever. everything about this app is buggy. can’t search for my provider to login, lastpass can’t fill credentials, app on phone forgets credentials, can’t use chrome browser! it’s been like this for years so the company obviously doesn’t gaf.

title: Security settings
content: security settings. why is your app suddenly forcing me to change my phone settings to 2-factor log on for my phone not your app before it will allow me to use your app???? this is intrusive?

title: I think this is a phishing app
content: i think this is a phishing app. i was sent an email for this app around time i was expecting legitimate eportal update from a new physician. after going through the setup i got errors and upon further review think this is a tool for phishing info.

title: Decent
content: decent. since i’ve had this app.. i can say that it’s not smoothly operating, but it does ok an hopefully they will have it running properly at active time soon.

title: Forcing me to set passcode for my iPhone
content: forcing me to set passcode for my iphone. every time i try to log in, it forces me to set up a passcode to unlock my iphone. which i do not want. won’t be using this app again until they fix it. i’d rather call my doctor.

title: Useless.
content: useless. useless, doesn't even have an online bill payment option. this is worse than their terrible online website, total joke. go to a real doctor.

title: The worst
content: the worst. i have to change my password every single time i try to login. the website is no better. i wish i organization would change from this app company. it’s the worst. i have never been able to use it.

title: Very Poor Ap
content: very poor ap. 1. no notice if the dr received a message  2. doesn’t allow attachments to messages  3. medication section is very confusing  4. extra $$ to allow patient to make and change appointments

title: Potential
content: potential. this app has a good structure, but why are can’t you add data from the heath app or an iphone. why only the other devices? i believe the recent restructure of the apps interface is better than it was.

title: no special characters??
content: no special characters?? it doesn’t make any sense how i cannot send a message to the doctor without using an apostrophe. they’re kind of important. it’s definitely not a special character and without proper grammar, how am i supposed to send a coherent message to our medical providers??

title: Worst app ever!!!!!!!!
content: worst app ever!!!!!!!! number one none of my medications transferred over. number two after your update my appointment no longer showed!!! i'm having a surgery and have to see my doctor. i had an anxiety attack! you need to get it together or not offer your services medically.

title: Why build something that’s worse than others
content: why build something that’s worse than others. will work only if you have a pin on your device, have to reidentify yourself each time, can’t send attachments.

title: Slow
content: slow. sometimes it starts buffering and screens never load. frustrating.

title: Horrible
content: horrible. this app is horrible.  the messaging system is horrible. your provider can reply to your message but you cannot reply to theirs; you have to send a new message to reply to them  the font in the messaging section is very light and hard to read.   the appointment section is frequently broken and will not schedule an appointment even though it says it’s doing so  they wasted their money when they hired whoever developed this app.

title: Absolute garbage
content: absolute garbage. very limited in what it is supposed to do. extremely buggy. locked me out for no good reason and wanted me to reset password, but the button to accept it doesn’t work, so now i can’t use it any more.

title: Total Crap
content: total crap. this app is useless. it crashes immediately when i open it. this is a health app with records that i need access to at all times. unacceptable performance and support from this company.  iphone 13 pro max 512gb storage running ios 15.2.1

title: Scam!! Waste of time!!
content: scam!! waste of time!! do not upload this app!! once you download and enter your information it’s just going to record that info and be able to hack your phone. do not enter your information into this app!!

title: Have tried to download 5 times
content: have tried to download 5 times. so frustrating. i gave up on this app several years ago but my doctor sent a message to me on it today. with some important information that i need. 😖

title: Bogus
content: bogus. this has got to be the lamest health care app ever. if the health care provider sends a link to you wouldn’t you expect that they would use it themselves? if it has a messaging capability wouldn’t you expect it to get a message to them?

title: User-hostile app
content: user-hostile app. if you’re lucky enough to be able to actually login, it provides no way of rescheduling appointments. it's much quicker just to call the office, be placed on hold, then rescheduling. that way, you can at least a accomplish something while you wait.

title: This app is atrocious
content: this app is atrocious. i’ve been trying to log into my account for 2 days to retrieve a message from my doctor. no matter what i do it will not let me log in. it spends 5 minutes spinning before telling me it cannot reach the server. the website is equally atrocious and garbage.

title: Good so far
content: good so far. this app does give me my info that my doc enters but i really wish it could show me info from all my docs. 😕

title: Frequent Yser
content: frequent yser. i would give it a 5 star but it listed my meds twice and some i could not erase. that is a real pain!

title: Nice app but outdated
content: nice app but outdated. it’s a nice app, but a tad outdated. it asks me to set up my fingerprint i’d, but my phone doesn’t have fingerprint id. it has had face recognition for a while now.

title: Excellent
content: excellent. love having my information in my hand

title: Instant help!
content: instant help! i love this app !!! my medication and appointments at my finger tips. easy to use, and a must for everyone.

title: The staff and Dr. Are great.
content: the staff and dr. are great. they take the time to listen. to their patients and fring out an action plan the works for them.

title: Waste of time and money

userName: Niknejm dat is not jet tejken
content: does not work at all. useless. i do not need to enable camera and mic to check my blood results. without this, app will not start. thank you. back to old way of calling the doctor and using fax. real step forward :)

title: Per my doctor this app is terrible
content: per my doctor this app is terrible. per my 2 doctors at hinsdale hospital this app is truly garbage. the idea of a “thread” does not exist, every communication is a new email, and my doctor has to send separate emails because the portal is just truly sub par.  avoid & delete

title: Confirm button doesn’t work
content: confirm button doesn’t work. on registering, after entering passwords and verifying, and selecting and answering a security question, the confirm button doesn’t respond.  i saw there was an update and it might work now. the confirm button still doesn’t work.

title: Can’t validate as user
content: can’t validate as user. the “confirm” button at the very end of the validate user flow doesn’t do anything, with no errors thrown. waste of space on my phone, and worse, the app has my pii with no benefit to me. worse than useless.

title: Great app easy to navigate
content: great app easy to navigate. this is a great secure app to view your med records results messages etc. very nice interface. please add support for iphone face id access.

title: This is why I avoid medical apps
content: this is why i avoid medical apps. multiple login attempts. multiple password resets. and every single time i reset it still said invalid despite having the correct information entered. i’ll get my records the old fashioned way.

title: App is not functional
content: app is not functional. i love this app.  however, it no longer seems to work correctly since the recent update.  i can’t login, and when i try, it can’t locate my doctors office stating there is a server issue.

title: Pitiful
content: pitiful. they should be less obsessed with monetizing your cell phone location and more on making the app work properly. a waste of time. doctors (and thus patients) being taken for a ride on this.

title: Doesn’t work well
content: doesn’t work well. patients say it doesn’t work well. they have trouble getting set up on it. takes our front office staff a long time to get them up and running.

title: Pro app and easy to use.

title: So far not impressed
content: so far not impressed. it does not update faster than my doctors office updates me. can’t get results in a timely manner. i really just started using it after two radiological tests and blood work. so far i’m not impressed

title: Great AP
content: great ap. this ap is easy to use, and better than the one my primary care physician uses.

title: Doesn’t work with multiple providers
content: doesn’t work with multiple providers. spent hours re entering providers only for them not to show and when they did it didn’t show the appointments. this was after an email from them stating i had an appointment.  waste of time. junk app!!!

title: Works fine...once you get it setup
content: works fine...once you get it setup. i like it after i finally  connected.

title: Heals
content: heals. i really think this is an excellent app,i can check appointments,renew prescriptions and review summaries for each visit.  awesome app.

title: Not very reliable
content: not very reliable. hard to use.  won't reliably link to my account.  have lost count of how many times i've tied to link my account and it just spins around trying to log in until i finally kill it.  not very user friendly either

title: Not dependable
content: not dependable. my practice doesn't seem to be able to keep up to date information on the app meds are always wrong and they can't fix it even when they try still wrong.

title: App shuts down
content: app shuts down. i'm starting to use the app. i see errors in my meds and no way to edit/delete them. i write to their help desk and the app closes down as i am completing writing. that doesn't give much confidence in this app.

title: Not so useful if you have memory issues
content: not so useful if you have memory issues. once again, another medical app that does not have the ability to set up a biometric sign in. is it too expensive?

title: Needs serious work
content: needs serious work. this app is very poorly made. i’m a millennial in my 20s. i imagine the older generations would have even more problems figuring out how to use it. it’s not instinctive, and it borders on completely non-functional.

title: Healow review
content: healow review. i would give this a zero if i could. unable to access appointments. no reports concerning any procedure i’ve had.  no patient visit summary.  meds are wrong. unable to change them. no access to personal health records.

title: Just not helpful
content: just not helpful. can’t call or able to write or leave a message. you call and call and anyone doesn’t help you or listen to you. unable to leave a message.

title: Does not work with Apples latest upgrade
content: does not work with apples latest upgrade. i have had this app for quite some time but recently had to updat my iphone and now i can’t access the app to have access to my doctor and medical records.

title: Ridiculous app
content: ridiculous app. says i can leave messages but there is no place to do that. the only thing i ever get is an rx list and appointments. i would love to be able to leave a message but can’t. this app is really useless to me.

👎🏼. i do like this app except for the fact that the day of an appointment via video, it doesn’t show that days appointment on a computer so i have to have the appointment boa my phone which is a huge frustration for me.

title: Hard to sign in
content: hard to sign in. i have tried many times to sign in, and was only able to find any information a few times.

title: Can only view in vertical mode on ipad
content: can only view in vertical mode on ipad. this is a very confusing app, as it can only be viewed in vertical mode on my ipad and i am unable to use my keyboard.  i will try again at a later date in hopes they fix this issue.  in the meantime, it is unusable for me.

title: Not user friendly
content: not user friendly. the app shows different info then the website. looks like a work in progress.  but not sure what they are working on.  decent beta version, but running it live, so wasted a lot of time trying to use it.

title: Unintuitive and time consuming
content: unintuitive and time consuming. it is difficult to link providers and there is no clear way to manage your account after authenticating into the app. changing a phone number seems impossible.

title: Absolute garbage
content: absolute garbage. the app is horrendous.  it is the exact opposite of user friendly.  it automatically put me in for the practice closest to me, even though that is not the practice i use, and it will not allow me to change so that i can actually see my lab results.

title: App
content: app. i can see my appointments and my reply messages. but i can’t seem to send a message on the app. i seem to be able to see and do more things on my patient portal. i’ll probably just stick with that.

title: Best app ever!!
content: best app ever!! the best way to help keep up with medications, appointments, and messages from the doctor

title: Passwords
content: passwords. when signing in, this app required a password. that’s ok. but i got a notice that the app also changed my google password! now how did that happen?  i had to change my google password again to keep from being hacked! app will be deleted!

title: Mobile app
content: mobile app. i like having the app, however it is not very intuitive.

title: Logging In
content: logging in. the app is a great idea! i think it needs lots of upgrades. i have done the ios updates and now it won’t let me write a message to my doctor. it says logging in error.  please fix this

title: Nowhere as Good as The Epic System App, MyChart!
content: nowhere as good as the epic system app, mychart! clunky!  has difficulty when two or more doctors both give you accounts!  won't store lab slips for future lab work. i refer to my phone in doctors offices all the time, so the phone app must work easily!  much prefer epic's app mychart!!!

title: Horrible App
content: horrible app. the screen to select my doctor won't pull up to let me select him, it keeps bouncing out of sight and when i try to "hold" it there after scrolling up, my doctor is not selectable.  my medicines are doubled, or tripled.  this is a completely useless app as it is now.

title: Don’t Bother
content: don’t bother. this app doesn’t recognize my docs name or the practice name.  you can't go further without it accepting doc info.  so this means i cant have my own records in my hand.  frustrating and annoying and not right.

title: Developers probably don’t use the app
content: developers probably don’t use the app. because if they did, they would realize how painstakingly bad it is. this is an “app” for the sake of checking the box and moving on to the next thing. disappointing.

title: Fickle
content: fickle. sometimes pin works, sometimes it doesn’t. frustrating.

title: Garbage
content: garbage. i had to download this app to access my other portal and neither are accessible. you can’t edit information and you can’t pay your bill.

title: Doesn’t work.
content: doesn’t work. this portal doesn’t work, documents that drs office says are in portal do not show up and they say it hasn’t worked for 3 months. awful and frustrating system.  do not recommend.

title: Nice but could be better

title: Worse app ever

title: Medicine reminders

title: Healow

title: Why is a ? a special character
content: why is a ? a special character. i use this app all the time to communicate with my doctor. it is  painful how the app doesn’t allow contractions, question marks, forget about emoji.

title: Plan to be Badgered by Robo Callers - Just Say No
content: plan to be badgered by robo callers - just say no. well, if you want to be badgered by robocallers then this is the app for you. tell your physician. no. no more. their robocallers will call you endlessly. most importantly, they are abusive people who have many “health” fronts, but it will not end there. i have removed the app, but now they are vindictive souls. shame

title: Primitive
content: primitive. don’t expect to upload lab and other clinical results from another provider, the capability is missing.  it seems that the ability to do a document attachment to an email is also missing.  overall, it’s clumsy.

title: Incorrect Information
content: incorrect information. the app shows the wrong sex for me and there is no way to correct it. i have checked the doctors records which are correct.  healow says they don’t know how to correct it. disappointed in app so far.

title: I LOVE THIS APP!
content: i love this app! i love this app, what would make it perfect is when the dr adds other test information👍

title: Apostrophes are special characters?!
content: apostrophes are special characters?! the main thing i use this app for is to send messages to my doc’s office. i either have to write contractions without the correct punctuation, correcting the autocorrect, or write out every word in a very formal way. this should be pretty basic stuff.

title: Awful
content: awful. this is about to the worst app i’ve ever seen. nothing works. the login process is awful and if you forget a password, good luck changing it. i called the doctor’s office to complain and they told me that they’ve been having lots of problems. ugh!

title: Clunky
content: clunky. mediocre app, clunky, difficult to use.  try not to use if at all possible.

title: App needs updating, feels old.
content: app needs updating, feels old. this app has all the right ideas it just need to be updated to include more integrations into the ios ecosystem.   my wish list to support: add integration with apple health app and health records section be able to use apple watch data.  use face id/touch id to secure app add appointment via system calendar  these are just a few ideas that would update the app.

title: This app is great.
content: this app is great. it is a wonderful app it is time saving and very helpful.

title: App logged me out :(
content: app logged me out :(. i was enjoying this app for the most part until recently it has logged me out and i can no longer see any of my medical information or telehealth with my doctor

title: Crap app
content: crap app. i’m a physician. i have used many patent portals- athena my chart chs  this app is horrible - look at all the negative reviews all deserved  i know my name and i know my date of birth. this app won’t let me sign in and every time it erases my inputs and sends me back to enter name and dob. when i finally reset everything it gave me an error message and sent me back to name and dob page  easier to change doctors than use this app  i restate my well founded description as above:  crap app

title: Rating
content: rating. overall very easy to use, easy to setup and gain access to

title: Impressively bad

content: wonderful app! best way to keep in touch with my doctor, keep track of meds and appointments.

title: Has been refined over the years and works great
content: has been refined over the years and works great. works great!

content: app doesn’t provide all informative. love the fact that there is an app for communication with your doctor but all the info is not on the app. having to go back and forth from the app to the website is not worth having the app.

content: would have gotten 5 if it connected to apple health. would have gotten 5 if it connected to apple health

content: very basic ux and no integration with apple health records. app is functional and lets me see the health records. ui and ux for this app is terrible and it looks like it is developed by a school kid. my biggest ticker is that it doesn’t integrate with apple health records.

content: maxine. terrible and exhausting to deal with.  finally found my test results and when i went back to check again could not find then 👎

title: Sad they can’t get my name right

title: Needs work
content: needs work. on one of my providers it has locked me out. regardless off how many times they unlock it

content: healow app. it's ok but i find many mistakes.   for instance, my allergies are dramamine and tetracycline. it's been changed to dramamine and tetracain! idk how but it's wrong.  and little glitches like if i send s message , i never got a response.

title: It’s not showing my upcoming appointments
content: it’s not showing my upcoming appointments. it’s not showing my upcoming appointments. it says i have none. so i called and am told i do.

content: after using mychart, what a letdown! just not useful!  not intuitive! glitchy beyond belief!   awful portal!  my old doctor used the mychart portal and it was so well organized and worked flawlessly on pc or mobile.  this - forget it!

title: Typically awkward app
content: typically awkward app. healow is one of those apps that must have been written by a gen-x or millennial.  it’s awkward to use, slow, not thoroughly tested and really tells you nothing you don’t already know.  a total waste of time.

title: Awful App
content: awful app. i can’t use this app unless i put a password on my phone & ipad.   it’s my medical information and i get to choose who sees it. i resent having to use a password other than the one i use to sign in

title: Too small
content: too small. i hate this app, it is about a quarter size of my ipad and it only works in a vertical fashion so, i have to turn my ipad like i was reading a book, instead of a small computer. too bad i can’t rate it with zero stars.

title: Terrible
content: terrible. keeps saying no results found. i have three doctors there. went to where you search putting all the info in; it returned a timed out message. useless waste of time.

title: Worst app ever...
content: worst app ever... got on it once, only once. now i can’t get on it. can’t dispute or change the misinformation on it. doctors office can’t even correct the info...or find the person responsible to change it. awful!

title: Wasted time, can’t set up
content: wasted time, can’t set up. this app asked for a 4 digit pin and all it gave me was 4 empty dots! i need numbers to set a pin. there are none. the app is buggy. i’ve used it before, no problem. the developers need to fix this asap.

title: Horrible login
content: horrible login. i  login to account and then go to add new provider. i  find provider then have to login manually...... i  usually login with face id, i  don’t remember login info.  reset info and still won’t work.  trash!

title: Impossible to access
content: impossible to access. have been to doctor's office and received explicit instructions. cannot access even after entering user and office provided pw. i am not wasting any more time. i will use telephone and vice versa if doctor wishes to connect with me. dpc/md

title: Poor experience
content: poor experience. so i get this email to download the app, but there’s no user name. no option to register.  i got the pin sent to my phone but no instructions.  no portal info.  if you want me to use your app you need to fix your side of the process

title: Only as good as the doctor’s office.
content: only as good as the doctor’s office. still need to call office because office does not post labs or respond to messages through app in a timely manner. that makes the app pretty much worthless.

title: Excellent App
content: excellent app. keeps me up-to-date on appointments and let’s me communicate with the medical staff. i like it!

title: Very disappointed
content: very disappointed. i had this app about 4 weeks. i’ve had to ask my doctors office to update twice now and it is still not up to date.

title: Bad app
content: bad app. this app is extremely difficult to use! you go back and forth from screen to screen never getting to the actual doctors site. i consider myself to be computer literate but than doesn’t help.

title: Useless
content: useless. terrible. it's hard to see how any app could be more useless than this one. and, to make things worse, it often crashes on launch, only way to fix seems to be to delete & reinstall app.

title: Lori
content: lori. i really like the app.  i can get test results quicker without having to wait for medical staff to call.

title: Needs some work
content: needs some work. you should be able to update your insurance info and add your phone number. you should also be able to delete messages. not all my records transferred over. needs so updating

title: Good App
content: good app. would be better if you added other tracking devices.

title: Bill pay
content: bill pay. i’ve looked several times and have not been able to figure out how to pay my bill on the app.

title: I don’t like it all
content: i don’t like it all. too cumbersome to the most difficult app i have ever tried to use.  it is horrible. i don’t see how anyone can use it.

title: Ugh!
content: ugh! it took me hours and many tries to set up my account. very user unfriendly! i dread logging on again. i’m fairly computer/ipad literate for my age, but i can imagine older folks having a terrible time with it.

title: bad user experience
content: bad user experience. the actual features of healow are okay, but in order to get into the app i have to type in a chosen password that is unable to be turned off, but you cant do that unless your phone’s password is turned on? it just wont let you submit your healow passwors without your phone and face id password set to on

title: Passcode
content: passcode. this app would be fine if it didn’t require you to have a passcode set on your phone. it is completely unnecessary

title: New update is awful
content: new update is awful. the newest update is awful! it requires me to have a passcode on my phone to even get into the app. yes, the app has a pin and that’s fine, but i prefer to not have a passcode on my actual phone. please change this!

title: No longer working
content: no longer working. neither the app or the website are letting me in to see my messages or records. i loved the app up until this latest update.

title: ZERO SUPPORT
content: zero support. i tried to set this app up 4 times and was not successful. i contacted them each time and they refused to communicate any way besides e-mail. they will not call you or give you a number to call them. i am deleting the app and advising my provider about the horrible support i received.

title: Horrid
content: horrid. this app is worthless if the office you use isn’t listed as a provider. you cannot login unless you pick a location. it’s not up to date and worthless.

title: This app is garbage
content: this app is garbage. the password feature doesn’t work, recovery doesn’t work right, it removes all entered data when you switch out to use a password manager. if i could give this a lower rating i would.

title: Who uses it?
content: who uses it? i can’t review the app as a piece of software, but the two doctors that requested i use it don’t enter or update my information. can’t make or cancel appointments, can’t see appointment or test history. the use of the app is non-existent. my doctors don’t use it.

title: Cant make payments
content: cant make payments. it doesn’t give me the option to make my payments that are due like the website. i don’t own a computer, so that won’t work for me.

title: Needs Refinement
content: needs refinement. it works ok but could be so much better.  hopefully they are looking to improve it.

title: Truly A Bad Application
content: truly a bad application. someone, somewhere has managed to hoodwink medical offices into using this application.  it is buggy, difficult to load, and frequently just crashes.  i am profiecient at computers, and wouyld support a well written application for the purpose, but this is not it.

title: Has not worked in 3 months.
content: has not worked in 3 months. this app used to work great. not anymore. for over 3 months it keeps giving an error message with no fix or solution.

title: Forced Security
content: forced security. i don’t do passcodes or facial recognition. but it will not let you proceed from the opening window if you don’t add that level of security. i’ll continue to log in online. less of an inconvenience.

title: Unable to connect to televisit server?!?
content: unable to connect to televisit server?!? the whole point of 2021 is to visit via web what is up with the server?!? i have an iphone 11 connected to the updated app and it won’t connect!

title: Needs a lot of work
content: needs a lot of work. basic functions are missing.  you can’t edit your account, e.g. add or change: phone numbers, email or physical addresses. or even log out.

title: Warning; May be Hazardous to your Health!!!
